- REF

  後置if便利からのcompact便利
  - https://qiita.com/necojackarc/items/e47a87ebb72e3f92b4e9

- CMD

```
ruby -e 's,e=$*.map &:to_i;puts *[*s..e].map{|e|[e,e.to_s(16),e.to_s(8),e.to_s(2),(e.chr Encoding::UTF_8)] if (not("0x0".to_i(16)<=e and e<="0x20".to_i(16))) and (not ("0x7f".to_i(16)<=e and e<="0x9f".to_i(16))) and (not ("0xD800".to_i(16)<=e and e<="0xDFFF".to_i(16)))}.compact' 5760 5787 | xargs -n5
```

- OUT

```
5760 1680 13200 1011010000000  
5761 1681 13201 1011010000001 ᚁ
5762 1682 13202 1011010000010 ᚂ

5769 1689 13211 1011010001001 ᚉ

5771 168b 13213 1011010001011 ᚋ

```
